data.title: Data Explorer Component
data.description: This component has the objective to let the user browse and manage their data repository.

definition_of_done.title: User should be abble to create a Schema
User should be abble to browse the list of all available schemas
When the User clicks on a schema, it should show all available DataRecords
When the user clicks on a Data Record, it should display it
User should be able to return at any point to the list of schemas and Data Record list
All data should be stored as plain JSON files on the user Google Drive Account
